name: The Grim Adventures of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Residents of Terror
name_original: The Grim Adventures of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Residents of Terror
description:
WOW! This is my crossover fangame. It's called The Grim Adventures of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Residents of Terror.

It's made with Darkyoshi Mario Engine 4 and Billy and Mandy Engine.

StyxCommander: Engine Support, Game Support, Video Support and for Supporting this
